article_title: Reporters’ Notebook: The Business Stories We Should Be Thinking About
article_text:
On the final day of Here & Now host Jeremy Hobson’s visit to New York City, he sits down with three of our regular guests who cover business, to take a look at the most important business stories that we should be thinking about, that will impact the world for years to come. He also asks each guest to describe an untold New York City story that reveals something important about the city.

Guests

article_metadata.description: CNN's Maggie Lake, CBS's Jill Schlesinger and The Atlantic's Derek Thompson discuss the most important stories they're covering.
